var isLiked=card.likes.some(function(user){return user._id===currentUser._id;});var cardLikeButtonClassName="like-button ".concat(isLiked?"like-button_active":"");function handleCardLike(){onCardLike(card);}function handleClick(){onCardClick(card);}function handleCardDelete(){onCardDeleteClick(card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"element",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{"arial-label":"delete",type:"button",className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,id:"delete-card-button",onClick:handleCardDelete}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"element__image",src:card.link,alt:card.name,onClick:handleClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"element__title",children:card.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element__like-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{"arial-label":"like",type:"button",className:cardLikeButtonClassName,onClick:handleCardLike}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"like-button__counter",children:card.likes.length})]})]})]});}export default Card;
